subject: Fashion
title: Lagos Street Style Scene
description: A quick win: understand Lagos Street Style Scene.

hook.text: Lagos Fashion Week proves Africa isn't following trendsâ€”it's setting them.

buildup.text: Nigerian street style blends Ankara prints with global streetwear silhouettes.

discovery.text: Young Lagos designers sell globally via Instagram without traditional gatekeepers.

twist.text: Western brands now scout Lagos for color, pattern, and energy inspiration.

climax.text: Africa's fashion influence is growing faster than any other continent's.

punchline.text: Lagos doesn't follow the conversation. It starts one.

quiz.question: How do young Lagos designers reach global markets?
options: Via Instagram and social media directly
